RelatedSentence: South Korean President Park Geun-Hye on Monday apologised for her government 's handling of the Sewol ferry disaster and announced that the widely criticised national coastguard would be dismantled .
As the president responsible for the lives and safety of South Koreans , I offer my sincere apology for all the suffering inflicted upon the people , Park said in a televised address to the nation .
